Posts.Content: Quote: Originally Posted by rawr2010 Hi... today as I was about to take a shower I noticed both of my breasts had red dark spider veins right by the areola. Both of them. And I have a light brown patches. My breasts also both have ingrown hair bumps (so they feel rough). I have rashes and I'm really scared I have large breasts... I'm 18 years old. I have thick green veins going through my areola as well. I'm currently only period right now and I'm terrified. Please help. None of those symptoms are suggestive of breast cancer in any way. Breast cancer virtually never occurs in women in their teens. See your doctor if it would make you feel better to be checked, but I think it's likely you are perfectly fine.
Posts.Title: Inflammatory breasts cancer?
